name: Lottery UK
overview:
Lottery UK is a leading aggregator of lottery results for the various lotteries operating in both the UK and Ireland.

They offer a range of results services covering the National Lottery, Euromillions, the Health Lottery and the Irish National Lottery. The results are updated in real-time as each of the draws takes place and are then distributed using social media, iPhone apps and a network of websites.

As well as the results service they also offer a range of lottery tools to aid players in getting a better experience from their lottery participation. These tools include automatic lottery results checkers, random number generators and extensive lottery statistics.
